name: Cyber Cyborg
description:
Everything made by Cyberdevs: Bárbara Santos, David Sousa, Fernando Teixeira except for:

Weapons made by (https://gg-undroid-games.itch.io) with some ajustments made by Bárbara to fit the theme of the game.

Enemies: 

  • flying bot made by (https://j0nbtz.itch.io)
  • robot with red cape made by: (https://pink-nantis.itch.io)
  • drone made by: (https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/18720)

Smartphone and items icons made by: (https://kyrise.itch.io/)

Ui icons made by: (https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io)

Font made by: (https://arcade.itch.io)

Vfx Effects made by: (https://pimen.itch.io) and (https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/18720)

Sound effects by: (https://sidearm-studios.itch.io)

Background sounds by: (https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/23694) and (https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/9381)
